title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: I. H.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and brush and black ink, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: I.H.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Square monogram comprised of an "H" in black ink outline superimposed upon a black "I" behind the cross-bar of the "H".
